title: Dante Di Benedetti
text:
Dante Di Benedetti (born October 28, 1916 in <a href="Genzano%20di%20Roma">Genzano di Roma</a>) is a former <a href="Italy">Italian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
He played for 8 seasons (143 games, 52 goals) in the <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> for <a href="A.S.%20Roma">A.S. Roma</a>, <a href="ACF%20Fiorentina">ACF Fiorentina</a>, <a href="A.S.%20Bari">A.S. Bari</a> and <a href="S.S.C.%20Napoli">S.S.C. Napoli</a>.
He was among the top 10 scorers of the 1940/41 <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> season.
